reviews.text: I attended an exhibition in Paderborn but had to book a hotel room in Bielefeld. At 33 Euros per night my expectations were pretty low but this hotel well surpassed them.
reviews.title: 33 Euros Per Night - Bargain!
would stay again
reviews.text: They have very good systems in place, everything uses entry codes so there are minimal staff around. The rooms themselves consist of a double bed with a bunk above it and a pre-fabricated shower and toilet. Very clean and functional. There is a Burger King next door with a McDonalds and Subway further down the road.
